command.generateTest.title: Dontforgetest: Generate Tests (QuickPick)
command.openPanel.title: Dontforgetest: Open Panel
command.generateTestFromCommit.title: Dontforgetest: Generate Tests from Latest Commit Diff
command.generateTestFromCommitRange.titl: Dontforgetest: Generate Tests from Commit Range Diff
command.generateTestFromWorkingTree.titl: Dontforgetest: Generate Tests from Uncommitted Diff
command.showTestGeneratorOutput.title: Dontforgetest: Show Output Log
command.selectDefaultModel.title: Dontforgetest: Select Default Model
command.openSettings.title: Dontforgetest: Open Settings

configuration.title: Dontforgetest
configuration.cursorAgentPath.descriptio: Path to cursor-agent command (resolved from PATH if not specified)
configuration.maxParallelTasks.descripti: Maximum number of parallel tasks for multi-file processing (snapshot capture/restore, etc.)
configuration.defaultModel.description: Default model to pass to cursor-agent (auto if empty)
configuration.customModels.description: Fallback list of model candidates (used in QuickPick, etc.)
configuration.testStrategyPath.descripti: Path to test strategy rules file (uses built-in default if empty)
configuration.includeTestPerspectiveTabl: Generate and save test perspective table (Markdown) before test generation
configuration.perspectiveReportDir.descr: Directory to save test perspective tables (auto-generated) (workspace-relative or absolute)
configuration.perspectiveGenerationTimeo: Maximum execution time for test perspective table generation (cursor-agent) in milliseconds. No timeout if 0 or less.
configuration.testExecutionReportDir.des: Directory to save test execution reports (auto-generated) (workspace-relative or absolute)
configuration.testCommand.description: Test execution command (no execution if empty. e.g., npm test, pnpm test, pytest)
configuration.testExecutionRunner.descri: Test execution handler (cursorAgent=execute via cursor-agent and extract results, extension=execute directly by extension)
configuration.allowUnsafeTestCommand.des: (Kept for compatibility) Previously, when testExecutionRunner=extension, test commands that might launch VS Code in a separate process were skipped. Now tests are always executed due to improvements, so this setting is basically ignored.
configuration.cursorAgentForceForTestExe: Add --force to cursor-agent for test execution (bypasses command execution approval, but also allows file editing, so default is false, enable explicitly only when needed)
configuration.enablePreTestCheck.descrip: Run type checking/Lint after test code generation and attempt automatic fixes if errors are found
configuration.preTestCheckCommand.descri: Type checking/Lint command to run after generation (e.g., npm run compile, npm run lint, tsc --noEmit)
